title: Eclair. Episode 07
creator_credit: Alma Gray, David Ash, Pat McLagan and ILEA
brief_description: The series “Eclair” features Ted, a rather confused and naive Englishman and a pair of mischievous French adolescent twins. The theme of this film is: “Transport and travel” using phrases concerned with travel, rail arrival and departure terminology.
creator_credit_for_label: Alma Gray, David Ash, Pat McLagan and ILEA
